text:
[Verse]
Stars shine so bright
In the cool night air
Dreams take their flight
Without a care

[Verse 2]
Moon whispers soft
Mysteries unfold
Hearts feel aloft
Stories told

[Chorus]
Starry nights
Hold me tight
Feel the light
In the night

[Verse 3]
Lights twinkle high
Darkness turns to play
Magic in the sky
Leads the way

[Verse 4]
Wind sings its song
In the night’s embrace
Where we belong
In this space

[Chorus]
Starry nights
Hold me tight
Feel the light
In the night
title: Starry Nights
